long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
In today’s fast-paced job market, keeping track of countless job applications can feel overwhelming. While spreadsheets are a trusted tool, maintaining them can be a tedious task. Enter AppliTracker—your two-click solution to streamline job tracking without disrupting your workflow.

With AppliTracker, there’s no need to juggle between platforms or overhaul your process. Simply connect your Google Spreadsheet (REMEMBER TO GIVE LINK ACCESS), hit SCAN to auto-scrape job details from LinkedIn, and then click UPDATE to instantly add the job information to your spreadsheet. Customize your data as you see fit after it’s added—AppliTracker makes tracking job applications easier than ever.

Currently optimized for LinkedIn and new Google Sheets, AppliTracker is designed with simplicity and convenience in mind. Stay tuned for future updates that will expand functionality to other websites and spreadsheet templates!
